March 21, 2025 - Kanopy is an on-demand streaming video platform for public and academic libraries that offers films, TV shows, educational videos and documentaries. The service is free for end users, but libraries pay fees on a pay-per-view model, from which content owners and content creators are paid.

t: Watching Kanopy on Amazon Fire TV
s: Install the Kanopy app on a supported Amazon Fire TV, then launch Kanopy.

t: Watching Kanopy on Amazon Fire tablets
s: The Kanopy app is available in the Amazon Appstore for supported Amazon Fire tablets. To use the app, you'll need a Kanopy account with an active library or academic membership.

t: Can I play Kanopy on my TV? - Ask Us!
s: There are a number of ways to play Kanopy on your TV, including: The 4th generation or newer Apple TV boxes, Roku boxes, sticks, and TVs, and Amazon Fire TV boxes, sticks, and TVs can install a Kanopy app and can be controlled with a remote.

t: How do I watch kanopy on my television? - Ask a Librarian
s: Many major smart TV brands already have access to the kanopy app. Search the app listings on your TV. You can also use an external device like a Roku, AppleTV, Android TV or Amazon Fire Stick.
